name: Adventure Island - Landscape Running World Games
name_original: Adventure Island - Landscape Running World Games
description:
Adventure is a small pixels style landscape adventure game. You need to keep running and get rid of enemies. You can throw hammer at enemy after you get the hammer item. Every time you smash with enemy stone, or the fire you will lose some of you life. But you can eat the cherry while running and jump, it will gain you a little life. so you need to keep eating and running. Try and see how far can you get, And can you meet and kill the boss enemy.

It's really a funny and challenge game
